body:
There are a few places in the docs that need updated as well:

```shell
~/src/normandy $ rg 'npm install' docs
docs/dev/recipe-client-addon/install.rst
31:      npm install

docs/dev/recipe-client-addon/workflow.rst
15:   npm install
35:      npm install --save ajv@5.2.2
152:   npm install

docs/dev/recipe-server/workflow.rst
38:   npm install

docs/dev/recipe-server/install.rst
70:      npm install
```
